posts.title: Welcome to my blog!
posts.author: Kris Airdancer
posts.body:
Welcome to my blog! Please excuse any bugs. I'm still working those out!

My intent for this part of the site is to be able to blog from Europe while Vista and I hike Der Traumpfad. But I'm still a bit skeptical that this will work. Guess we'll just have to see how it goes.

Oh! I should also mention, there won't be any images in the posts on this blog yet. I haven't had the time to get that part setup yet. But I'll hopefully have that ready by the time we leave for the trip.

- Chris
